thread.title: How to Prepare Your Small Business For Winter Weather Threats
thread.title_full: How to Prepare Your Small Business For Winter Weather Threats - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: How to Prepare Your Small Business For Winter Weather Threats
text:
U.S. Small Business Administration
Get Tips at Free Webinar Hosted by SBA and Agility Recovery
WASHINGTON , Oct. 19, Whether it's pounding rainfall, massive snowstorms, burst pipes on the heels of freezing temperatures or power outages, winter weather presents many threats that can lead to business shutdowns, property damage and loss of life.
Now is a good time to make a plan to stay open for business, while protecting your employees and customers from the dangers of severe winter weather.
On Tuesday, October 27 , Agility Recovery and the U.S. Small Business Administration will host a free webinar focusing on best practices to mitigate the risks posed by the season. The tips you'll learn during the webinar can be executed simply, and at a low cost.
SBA has partnered with Agility to offer business continuity strategies through the "PrepareMyBusiness" website. Visit www.preparemybusiness.org to access past webinars and for disaster preparedness checklists.
The SBA provides disaster recovery assistance in the form of low-interest loans to homeowners, renters, private nonprofits and businesses of all sizes. To learn more, visit www.sba.gov/disaster .
WHAT: Winter Weather Preparedness-- Business continuity tips from Agility Recovery, followed by a question and answer session.
WHEN: Tuesday, October 27 -- 2 to 2:30 p.m. EDT
HOW: Space is limited. Register at http://agil.me/1LQuvTL
Release Number: MA 15-57
Contact: Carol Chastang (202) 205-6987
Internet Address: http://www.sba.gov/news
Follow us on Twitter , Facebook & Blogs
